QuestData.Title: Sinstone Delivery
QuestData.Description:
Lord Chamberlain has held off the Accuser to buy us the time we needed to break the ward on her sinstone.
But, thanks to your delays, our reinforcement of his position is overdue.
I will collect the Accuser's sinstone and carry us to the battle.
QuestData.LogDescription: Fly with Echelon and deliver the Accuser's Sinstone to Lord Chamberlain.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Lord Chamberlain on the Halls of Atonement balcony.
QuestData.RewardText:
This is, in fact, one of the larger sinstones I have seen.
This will be easy to exploit.
